K12D0647=D1079_H0644:215a-0: @215a yi dvags mo kha 'bar ma dbugs dbyungs ba'i gtor ma'i cho ga //
K12D0647=D1079_H0644:215a-1: dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12D0647=D1079_H0644:215a-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das yul ser skya na shing
K12D0647=D1079_H0644:215a-3: n+ye gro dha'i kun dga' ra ba na dge slong
K12D0647=D1079_H0644:215a-5: byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po dang /
K12D0647=D1079_H0644:215a-6: sems can gyi tshogs chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te chos ston to //
K12D0647=D1079_H0644:215a-7: de nas kun dga' bo dben par 'dug ste nang
K12D0647=D1079_H0644:215a-8: du yang dag 'jog cing rtse gcig tu yid la
K12D0647=D1079_H0644:215a-9: byed pas / chos mngon gsum du byed pa na
K12D0647=D1079_H0644:215a-10: mtshan mo nam gyi cha smad la de'i mdun du
K12D0647=D1079_H0644:215a-11: yi dvags mo kha 'bar ma 'dug nas smras pa
K12D0647=D1079_H0644:215a-12: byed pas / / kye kun dga' bo /
K12D0647=D1079_H0644:215a-14: yi dvags kyi gnas 'dir skye bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0647=D1079_H0644:215a-19: gal te nang pa yi dvags gangg'a'i klung gyi bye
K12D0647=D1079_H0644:215a-20: ma khrag khrig phrag 'bum gyi bye ma snyed dag
K12D0647=D1079_H0644:215a-21: la yi dvags re re la yang zas dang /
K12D0647=D1079_H0644:215b-0: skom @215b yul ma ga dha'i bre bo che bdun bdun tsam byin te /
K12D0647=D1079_H0644:215b-1: bram ze'i drang srong 'bum yang tshim par byas la /
K12D0647=D1079_H0644:215b-2: bdag gi ming gis dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa byas na /
K12D0647=D1079_H0644:215b-3: de ltar na khyod kyi tshe yang phyir nur bar 'gyur la /
K12D0647=D1079_H0644:215b-4: bdag kyang yi dvags kyi 'jig rten nas shi 'phos
K12D0647=D1079_H0644:215b-5: te mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur
K12D0647=D1079_H0644:215b-6: ro // de nas kun dga' bos yi dvags mo kha 'bar ma rid cing mdog ngan la /
K12D0647=D1079_H0644:215b-10: ral pa'i phung po g-yengs pa /
K12D0647=D1079_H0644:215b-11: spu dang sen mo ring ba mthong ste; tshig mi
K12D0647=D1079_H0644:215b-12: snyan cing yid du mi 'ong ba de thos nas
K12D0647=D1079_H0644:215b-13: skrag cing sdangs te spu zing zhes byas nas /
K12D0647=D1079_H0644:215b-14: stan las langs te shin tu rings pa dang /
K12D0647=D1079_H0644:215b-15: shin tu myur ba'i shugs kyis bcom ldan 'das ga
K12D0647=D1079_H0644:215b-16: la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das
K12D0647=D1079_H0644:215b-17: kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te 'dar bzhin du 'di
K12D0647=D1079_H0644:215b-21: bde bar gshegs pa skyabs mdzad du gsol /
K12D0647=D1079_H0644:215b-22: bdag ni gnangs srog 'gum par 'gyur lags so //
K12D0647=D1079_H0644:215b-24: bdag gis yi dvags mo kha 'bar ma mthong ste /
K12D0647=D1079_H0644:216a-0: bdag gis rten thabs ci mchis zhes smras nas de'i mchid nas gal te khyod @216a *//
K12D0647=D1079_H0644:216a-1: kyis yi dvags gang+g'a'i klung gi bye ma khrag khrig
K12D0647=D1079_H0644:216a-2: phrag 'bum gyi bye ma snyed dag chim par byas
K12D0647=D1079_H0644:216a-3: te // bram ze'i drang srong 'bum yang tshim par byas na /
K12D0647=D1079_H0644:216a-4: de ltar na khyod kyi tshe phyir nur bar 'gyur ro zhes mchi na /
K12D0647=D1079_H0644:216a-6: de ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi ba bka' stsal du gsol //
K12D0647=D1079_H0644:216a-7: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya
K12D0647=D1079_H0644:216a-8: thub pas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la
K12D0647=D1079_H0644:216a-11: gang gis khyod yi dvags rnams dang /
K12D0647=D1079_H0644:216a-12: bram ze'i drang srong rnams tshim par byed par 'gyur ba'i thabs yod kyi /
K12D0647=D1079_H0644:216a-15: thams cad du 'od dang ldan pa rgya chen shugs ldan zhes bya ba'i gzungs yod do //
K12D0647=D1079_H0644:216a-16: des byin pa tsam gyis yi dvags gang+g'a'i klung gi
K12D0647=D1079_H0644:216a-17: bye ma khrag khrig phrag 'bum gyi bye ma snyed
K12D0647=D1079_H0644:216a-18: dag tshim par 'gyur te; yi dvags dang /
K12D0647=D1079_H0644:216a-19: bram ze'i drang srong re re la zas dang /
K12D0647=D1079_H0644:216a-20: skom yul ma ga dha'i bre bo bdun bdun byin par 'gyur ro //
K12D0647=D1079_H0644:216a-22: sngon nga bram zer gyur ba na byang chub sems
K12D0647=D1079_H0644:216a-23: dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten dbang phyug dang
K12D0647=D1079_H0644:216a-24: / de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten dbang phyug 'od las ngas bzung ste /
K12D0647=D1079_H0644:216b-1: bram ze'i drang srong grangs su bgrang ba mang ba dang /
K12D0647=D1079_H0644:216b-2: ches mang ba'ang ngas zas dang /
K12D0647=D1079_H0644:216b-3: skom gyis tshim par byas te /
K12D0647=D1079_H0644:216b-4: de dag thams cad yi dvags kyi 'jig rten nas shi 'phos nas lha'i 'jig rten du skyes so //
K12D0647=D1079_H0644:216b-6: khyod kyis zungs la ngo lon gyis shig /
K12D0647=D1079_H0644:216b-7: na ma: sarba ta th'a ga ta aa ba lo ki te /
K12D0647=D1079_H0644:216b-8: aom sam bha ra sam bha ra h'um/
K12D0647=D1079_H0644:216b-10: 'di yi dvags kyi gtor ma la lan bdun bzlas
K12D0647=D1079_H0644:216b-11: brjod byas nas lag pa brkyang ste drung du sbyin
K12D0647=D1079_H0644:216b-12: par bya'o // se gol yang brdab par bya'o //
K12D0647=D1079_H0644:216b-14: byin ma thag tu phyogs bzhi'i yi dvags gang+g'a'i klung
K12D0647=D1079_H0644:216b-15: gi bye ma khrag khrig phrag 'bum phrag gi bye
K12D0647=D1079_H0644:216b-16: ma snyed dag tshim par byas par 'gyur ro //
K12D0647=D1079_H0644:216b-17: yi dvags re re la yang yul ma ga dha'i bre bo bdun bdun byin par 'gyur ro //
K12D0647=D1079_H0644:216b-18: de dag kyang zos pa tsam gyis yi dvags kyi
K12D0647=D1079_H0644:216b-19: 'jig rten nas shi 'phos nas lha rnams kyi nang
K12D0647=D1079_H0644:216b-25: dge bsnyen ma rnams la rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par khor zug tu bsnyad par bya'o //
K12D0647=D1079_H0644:216b-27: bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par 'gyur te /
K12D0647=D1079_H0644:217a-0: de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba phrag 'bum gyi @217a *//
K12D0647=D1079_H0644:217a-1: bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
K12D0647=D1079_H0644:217a-2: rtag tu mi ma yin pa rgyu ba /
K12D0647=D1079_H0644:217a-5: grul bum la sogs pa dang /
K12D0647=D1079_H0644:217a-9: yi dvags rnams kyis mi mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0647=D1079_H0644:217a-11: brtson 'grus dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro //
K12D0647=D1079_H0644:217a-13: gzi brjid dang ldan pa dang /
K12D0647=D1079_H0644:217a-14: dran pa dang ldan par yang 'gyur ro //
K12D0647=D1079_H0644:217a-15: bram ze'i drang srong tshim par byed pa 'dod pa des ni /
K12D0647=D1079_H0644:217a-18: snod bkang ba la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas la
K12D0647=D1079_H0644:217a-19: 'bab chu ga la yod pa'i gnas der sbyin par
K12D0647=D1079_H0644:217a-21: bram ze'i drang srong gang+g'a'i klung gi bye ma khrag
K12D0647=D1079_H0644:217a-22: khrig 'bum phrag du ma'i bye ma snyed dag lha'i
K12D0647=D1079_H0644:217a-23: bza' ba dang / btung ba rnams kyis tshim par byas par 'gyur ro //
K12D0647=D1079_H0644:217a-24: bram ze'i drang srong de dag kyang dbang po tshim par 'gyur te /
K12D0647=D1079_H0644:217a-25: de dag thams cad kyis aom bde legs su gyur cig ces bya ba'i sgra 'byin par byed la /
K12D0647=D1079_H0644:217a-26: sems can de dag kyang bsam pa yongs su dag par 'gyur te /
K12D0647=D1079_H0644:217a-27: bram ze'i gzi brjid dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
K12D0647=D1079_H0644:217b-0: rtag tu tshangs par spyod par @217b yang 'gyur te /
K12D0647=D1079_H0644:217b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa gang+g'a'i klung gi bye ma khrag
K12D0647=D1079_H0644:217b-2: khrig phrag 'bum gyi bye ma snyed dag gi dge
K12D0647=D1079_H0644:217b-3: ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan par yang 'gyur ro //
K12D0647=D1079_H0644:217b-4: rtag tu dgra thams cad zhig par 'gyur ro //
K12D0647=D1079_H0644:217b-9: skom gyi yo byad la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas la sangs rgyas dang /
K12D0647=D1079_H0644:217b-17: dge ba snyen ma des phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhing gi sangs rgyas dang /
K12D0647=D1079_H0644:217b-19: dge 'dun la lha'i mchod pa dang /
K12D0647=D1079_H0644:217b-20: de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod pa'i mchog gis mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro //
K12D0647=D1079_H0644:217b-23: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dgongs shing lung bstan pa dang /
K12D0647=D1079_H0644:217b-24: lha thams cad kyis kun tu srung bar yang 'gyur ro //
K12D0647=D1079_H0644:217b-26: song la ngo lon yang gyis shig /
K12D0647=D1079_H0644:217b-27: sems can thams cad la yang dag par ston cig /
K12D0647=D1079_H0644:217b-28: dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs thams cad kyang gyis shig ces nga smra'o //
